title: Phoenix police release names of 2 men shot dead
content:
Phoenix police have publicly identified the two gunshot victims who were found dead after their car crashed into a wall in a residential neighborhood Monday morning.
Police on Tuesday identified the victims as Ronnie B. Orozco, 20, and Manuel D. Sanchez, 17. They have yet to identify any suspects in the case.
Police were called to the scene after the owners of the house called 911. The gunshot victims' car had collided with the half-wall in the front yard of a house on 31st Avenue and Pierce Road, according to police.
Orozco and Sanchez were pronounced dead at the scene. Police said the vehicle they were in had been shot multiple times; a rifle was found inside.
The police believe the shooting happened at a nearby location, but they still have no information about the circumstances that led to the event.
Police ask anyone with information to contact Silent Witness at 480-W-I-T-N-E-S-S
